  • Method Details

    • getClassActivities

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\') || hasRole(\'PARENT\')") public List<ClassworkResponse> getClassActivities(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId)
      Description copied from interface: ClassworkService
      Retrieves a list of class activities for a specific class.
      Specified by:
      getClassActivities in interface ClassworkService
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a list of `ClassworkResponse` objects representing the class activities Pre-condition: The `classId` must not be null and must refer to an existing class. Post-condition: Returns a list of class activities associated with the specified class.

    • getHomework

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\') || hasRole(\'PARENT\')") public List<HomeworkResponse> getHomework(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId)
      Description copied from interface: ClassworkService
      Retrieves a list of homework assignments for a specific class.
      Specified by:
      getHomework in interface ClassworkService
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      Returns:
      a list of `HomeworkResponse` objects representing the homework assignments Pre-condition: The `classId` must not be null and must refer to an existing class. Post-condition: Returns a list of homework assignments associated with the specified class.

    • createActivity

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\')") public void createActivity(@NotNull @NotNull ClassActivityRequest request, @NotNull @NotNull SignedHour signedHour)
      Description copied from interface: ClassworkService
      Creates or updates a class activity based on the provided request and signed hour.
      Specified by:
      createActivity in interface ClassworkService
      Parameters:
      request - the `ClassActivityRequest` object containing the details of the class activity
      signedHour - the `SignedHour` object associated with the class activity Pre-condition: - The `request` and `signedHour` parameters must not be null. - The `request.title()` must not be empty. Post-condition: The created or updated class activity is saved in the repository.

    • createHomework

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\')") public void createHomework(@NotNull @NotNull HomeworkRequest request, @NotNull @NotNull SignedHour signedHour)
      Description copied from interface: ClassworkService
      Creates or updates a homework assignment based on the provided request and signed hour.
      Specified by:
      createHomework in interface ClassworkService
      Parameters:
      request - the `HomeworkRequest` object containing the details of the homework assignment
      signedHour - the `SignedHour` object associated with the homework assignment Pre-condition: - The `request` and `signedHour` parameters must not be null. - The `request.title()` must not be empty and `request.dueDate()` must be a future date. Post-condition: - The created or updated homework assignment is saved in the repository. - If `request.hasChat()` is true, homework chats are created.
